languages.text: "Тростниковая пряность придает ему сладости, а взбитое синт-молоко — особой мягкости и воздушности. Глоток блаженства даже в самый хмурый день!"

traits.locale_text: "Тростниковая пряность придает ему сладости, а взбитое молоко грокса — особой мягкости и воздушности. Глоток блаженства даже в самый хмурый день!"
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"
languages.original_text: "Тростниковая пряность придает ему сладости, а взбитое синт-молоко — особой мягкости и воздушности. Глоток блаженства даже в самый хмурый день!"

traits.locale_text: "The reed spice makes it sweeter, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special airy softness. A sip of bliss on the dullest of days!"
"The reed spice makes it sweeter, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special airy softness. A sip of bliss on the dullest of days!"
"The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"
"The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"
"The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"
"The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

languages.text: "Das Zuckerrohr süßt ihn und die geschlagene synthetische Sahne verleiht ihm eine luftige Konsistenz. Eine köstliche Wohltat an jedem noch so düsteren Tag."
languages.original_text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Zuckerrohr süßt ihn und die geschlagene synthetische Sahne verleiht ihm eine luftige Konsistenz. Eine köstliche Wohltat an jedem noch so düsteren Tag."

languages.text: « L'épice de cane est idéale pour sucrer, tandis que la mousse de synthé-lait donne au recaff douceur et légèreté. Une vraie gorgée de bonheur qui vient égayer les jours les plus sombres ! »
languages.original_text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

traits.locale_text: « L'épice de cane est idéale pour sucrer, tandis que la mousse de synthé-lait donne au recaff douceur et légèreté. Une vraie gorgée de bonheur qui vient égayer les jours les plus sombres ! »

languages.text: 「ケインスパイスが甘みを加えて、ホイップした合成ミルクが特別でふんわりとしたやわらかさを与えてくれます。どんなに憂鬱な日でも、一口飲めば至福のひとときになります！」
languages.original_text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

traits.locale_text: 「ケインスパイスが甘みを加えて、ホイップした合成ミルクが特別でふんわりとしたやわらかさを与えてくれます。どんなに憂鬱な日でも、一口飲めば至福のひとときになります！」

languages.text: «La especia de caña lo endulza, y la leche sintética batida le da una suavidad especial. ¡Un sorbo de felicidad incluso en los días más tristes!».
languages.original_text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

traits.locale_text: «La especia de caña lo endulza, y la leche sintética batida le da una suavidad especial. ¡Un sorbo de felicidad incluso en los días más tristes!».

languages.text: “这杯咖啡里加了甘蔗香料与打发的合成牛奶，充满了轻盈、柔软的口感。即便是最忧郁的日子里，只要抿上一小口，就会感觉无比幸福！”
languages.original_text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

traits.locale_text: “这杯咖啡里加了甘蔗香料与打发的合成牛奶，充满了轻盈、柔软的口感。即便是最忧郁的日子里，只要抿上一小口，就会感觉无比幸福！”

languages.text: "Tadı şeker kamışından, kendine has hafif yumuşaklığı da köpürtülmüş sentetik sütten... Tek bir yudumu bile en nahoş günü tatlandırır!"
languages.original_text: "The cane spice sweetens it, and the whipped synth-milk gives it a special, airy softness. A sip of bliss on even the gloomiest of days!"

traits.locale_text: "Tadı şeker kamışından, kendine has hafif yumuşaklığı da köpürtülmüş sentetik sütten... Tek bir yudumu bile en nahoş günü tatlandırır!"
